generated_body: If the user clicks on "The Kardashians Face Backlash Over 'Insensitive' Family Food Fight in KUWTK Clip," they may expect to read about a recent controversy involving the Kardashian family, centering on a scene from their reality show that has drawn criticism for insensitivity.
